description.value:
Provides +10 to Research Tests involving Ciphers (Occult), Scholastic Lore (Legend), and Forbidden Lore (Cults, Daemonology, Warp, and/or Xenos). A Small Black Data-Slate made of durable materials that opens like a clasped book. Contains audio, pict recordings, and playback. Usually personally encrypted, genelocked, and set to explode if opened by those not authorised.

Requirements

Ordo Xenos only. Considered Heretical by some

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: 2500 T
